title: looking for a duo bot or just a duo in general
body:
looking for a supp or just a duo in general to play and climb.
right now i am s4 and semi good at adc and would like a not so brain dead support that solo q is really well none for. 
dont care what your rank is if you wanna give it ago im down, do have mic and discord too.

cheers everyone

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DonutDenis,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=iTh1FT37,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-04-28T03:23:28.666+0000)
>
> hey gurl gamer here xD
> 
> add me and we can play uwu
> 
> nuzzie wuzzies!!! 
> {{sticker:sg-lux}}  {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

gross
Hey dude, was silver last season, looking for an ADC to climb with. Tried to send a request but couldn't find you. Please chuck me an add when free :) Can play Morg, Leo, Sona.
Gotchu added already, but im down to play, just invite me whenever you wanna play fam <3
